content.prompt: The Tenth Amendment resulted most directly from which of the following?

choices.label: The vision of government articulated in The Federalist papers
Many Anti-Federalists’ concerns about the United States Constitution
New England states’ desire to limit slavery in the Northwest Territory
Efforts to stabilize the finances of the United States and to support industry

topic.text: 3.8: The Constitutional Convention and Debates over Ratification

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
